message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for this product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value.  However, I need to get closer to $10,000 for this. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $8,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I can only go up to $7,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
